textos_fuente.text: Contact | Celtic Cooling top of page Menu Close HOME ABOUT US TEAM BLOG Contact Contact Get in Touch Have a question, need a quote, or want to discuss your next project? Our team is ready to help. Reach out to us anytime—we're happy to assist with advice, service requests, or customized solutions. Simply fill out the contact form, and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible. Let's Chat General info@celtic.nl Sales sales@celtic.nl Social Media First Name Last Name Email Message Send Thanks for submitting! info@celtic.nl Bethlehemlaan 4, 2181 HN Hillegom , Netherlands ethiopia@celtic.nl Bole, friendship building 7th floor, office no 704/5 Addis Ababa, Ethiopia ​ ghana@celtic.nl 1st floor JK Owusu plaza Weija barrier kenya@celtic.nl Airport North Road Nairobi, Kenya bottom of page

When you shop at The Irish Gift House, you are ordering from our store, not from a 3rd party. The Irish Gift House is located in Arizona and was established in 1994 by Kerry OâNeal-Costanzo and Andrew Costanzo, who continue to own and operate this family business. Regular Business Hours (Mountain Standard Time - No daylight savings time in Arizona) Monday through Friday - 10:00 to 6:00. Saturday hours are maybe yes, maybe no.
